DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this long-term study is to determine whether NPC-01 is effective in the treatment of dysmenorrhea associated with endometriosis.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety, Long-Term Study of NPC-01 to Treat Dysmenorrhea Associated With Endometriosis
DOC.criteria: Dysmenorrhea associated with endometriosis Severe hepatopathy Pregnant woman
